text: Ceroplesis molator is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae. It was described by Johan Christian Fabricius in 1787. It is known from Ghana, Cameroon, Sierra Leone, Togo, and Senegal.BioLib.cz - Ceroplesis molator. Retrieved 8 September 2014. It feeds on Coffea canephora (robusta coffee). ==References== Category:Ceroplesis Category:Beetles described in 1787
title: Ceroplesis molator
